mapper.select: SELECT PUR_ORD_CODE, VDR_CODE, PUR_ORD_DATE, EXP_DLV_DATE, PUR_REQ_CODE, PUR_ORD_UDT_DATE, EMP_ID, UPDATE_ID, VAT_YN, COM_ID, TOT_SUP_PRICE, TOT_VAT_PRICE, TOT_AMT_SUM, getEmpName(EMP_ID) empName, getVdrName(VDR_CODE) vdrName, subCode(status) status FROM purchaseOrder WHERE com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY PUR_ORD_CODE DESC

SELECT PUR_ORD_DTL_CODE, i.ITEM_CODE, QUANTITY, SUP_PRICE, VAT_PRICE, TOT_PRICE, STATUS, RECCV_DATE, PUR_ORD_CODE, getItemName(i.item_code) itemName, price FROM purchaseOrderDetail d JOIN item i ON(d.item_code = i.item_code) WHERE pur_ord_code = #{param} AND d.com_id = #{comId}
SELECT PUR_REQ_CODE, IN_CODE, CREATED_DATE, PUR_IN_DATE, getEmpName(EMP_ID) empId, subCode(status) status, NOTE, COM_ID FROM purchaseRequest WHERE status='prs01' AND com_id = #{comId}

SELECT PUR_REQ_DTL_CODE, PUR_REQ_CODE, p.ITEM_CODE, getItemName(p.ITEM_CODE) itemName, QUANTITY, STATUS, CREATED_DATE, NOTE, i.price price, i.price*QUANTITY totPrice, (i.price/10)*QUANTITY vatPrice, (i.price-i.price/10)*QUANTITY supPrice FROM PURCHASEREQUESTDETAIL p JOIN item i ON(p.item_code = i.item_code) WHERE PUR_REQ_CODE = #{purCode} AND i.com_id = #{comId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'poc-' || (NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(pur_ord_code,5))),100)+1) FROM purchaseOrder
INSERT INTO purchaseOrder (PUR_ORD_CODE, VDR_CODE, PUR_ORD_DATE, EXP_DLV_DATE, PUR_REQ_CODE, EMP_ID, STATUS, VAT_YN, COM_ID, TOT_SUP_PRICE, TOT_VAT_PRICE, TOT_AMT_SUM) VALUES(#{purOrdCode},#{vdrCode},sysdate,#{expDlvDate},#{purReqCode},#{empId},'pst01','vat01',#{comId},#{totSupPrice},#{totVatPrice},#{totAmtSum})

SELECT 'porc-' || (NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PUR_ORD_DTL_CODE,6))),100)+1) FROM purchaseOrderDetail
INSERT INTO purchaseOrderDetail (PUR_ORD_DTL_CODE, ITEM_CODE, QUANTITY, SUP_PRICE, VAT_PRICE, TOT_PRICE, STATUS, COM_ID, PUR_ORD_CODE) VALUES (#{purOrdDtlCode},#{itemCode},#{quantity},#{supPrice},#{vatPrice},#{totPrice},'pds-01',#{comId},#{purOrdCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE purchaseorder SET VDR_CODE=#{vdrCode}, PUR_REQ_CODE=#{purReqCode}, exp_dlv_date=#{expDlvDate}, PUR_ORD_UDT_DATE=sysdate, UPDATE_ID=#{empId}, TOT_SUP_PRICE=#{totSupPrice}, TOT_VAT_PRICE=#{totVatPrice}, TOT_AMT_SUM=#{totAmtSum} WHERE pur_ord_code = #{purOrdCode} AND com_id = #{comId}
